title: Lord of the Sabbath and its light

verses.text: Lord of the Sabbath and its light, I hail thy hallowed day of rest; It is my weary soul's delight, The solace of my care-worn breast.
O sacred day of peace and joy, Thy hours are ever dear to me; No earthly care shall e'er destroy The holy calm I find in thee.
How sweetly now they glide along! How hallowed is the calm they yield! Transporting is their rapturous song, And heavenly visions seem revealed.
O Jesus, let me ever love Thy presence with the day of rest; Then shall my servant heart have done To bless thy Sabbath doubly blest.
